item.title: Surprise Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition has fans thinking Warner Bros. has quietly wrapped up development - Eurogamer
item.description:
1. Surprise Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition has fans thinking Warner Bros. has quietly wrapped up development  Eurogamer
  2. Mortal Kombat 1 Definitive Edition launches today, includes all DLC  Polygon
  3. WARNER BROS. GAMES LAUNCHES MORTAL KOMBAT 1: DEFINITIVE EDITION  Warner Bros. Discovery
  4. Mortal Kombat 2 movie skins now available in Mortal Kombat 1 as potentially the last new content for the game  EventHubs
  5. After 19 months and $162 worth of DLC, Mortal Kombat 1 is finally komplete and all included in a single $70 package, but fans are lamenting that "it's over" so soon  GamesRadar+
